reviews.title: A peaceful nest in a moving district.
reviews.text: The Garden Inn is a beautiful house in the moving district of Parkdale. Our hosts were charming and it was a great pleasure to have a chat with them. The house is clean, so is the shared bathroom, the only little negative point would be the bed. It was a bit little for two and the mattress was hard and not comfortable. There's a magnificent garden in the back too that can be used by evryone, great place to have a glass of wine... They provided us a parking pass for 10$ a day wich it was usefull, we left the car there all the time we were there. The neigbourhood can be a bit scary for some travelers, there's a lot of pauverty but we felt absolutely safe walking around. We found some amazing restaurants in the area, you dont have to go in all those overrated districts to get a great meal and it's cheaper. I highly recommand this place, specially for people that like arts and good food.

reviews.title: "Hostal" la película
reviews.text: Al llegar el taxista nos pregunto ¿es ahí donde se quedaran? Si, le respondimos y bajamos del auto con las maletas, pero nadie contestaba el timbre. Finalmente, apareció Alan con olor a trago y nos hizo sacarnos los zapatos. Después de 45 minutos de explicarnos las reglas de la casa, al fin pudimos subir a nuestro dormitorio, pero faltaba más, el baño es compartido. Nunca comprendí porqué Alan y Patricia insistían en que fuera a conocer el jardín y siempre hablando conmigo, a mi novia no la miraban a los ojos. Al día siguiente fuimos caminando al centro ya que se nos dijo que estaba a 15 minutos a pie, tardamos una hora en llegar. No quisimos volver tarde ya que el barrio era extraño, de hecho vimos a un señor de edad desnudo en su terraza. Cancelamos nuestra estadía y arrancamos del lugar, sin antes tener que conversar otra hora más con Alan para despedirnos. Nos sentimos observados durante nuestra estadía y pienso que nos seguían.

reviews.title: Frustrated by the phone call
reviews.text: I haven't visited yet, called the number on booking.com, Patricia was quite blunt and was not cooperative. She asked me to call staff in the morning to ask my questions , in a very offenssive way. She is running a business, I believe she should have better communication withcustomers.If I did not cancel, I will never go back again and will let my friends know if asked.

reviews.title: Awesome stay
reviews.text: We are leaving now, sad to say goodbye. Allan and Patricia have been ace hosts, although we saw Allan mainly. Beautiful property with a secluded garden, tasty breakfasts, quiet street. Easy walk along queen street to centre of Toronto, with unique shops and eateries along the way. Allan is a really cool guy, takes care of you and is fascinating to talk to. Would recommend to everyone.
